Package sample.objects

Class GraphicObject

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.shape.Shape
javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
sample.objects.GraphicObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class GraphicObject
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
GraphicObject class fill each grid with pictures. It also contains methods to change the wall color and keeper pictures.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphicObject

      public GraphicObject​(GameObject obj)
      This is the only constructor of the GraphicObject class. It judges the input object and fills it with the corresponding picture.
      Parameters:
      obj - GameObject obj to be filled with picture.

  • Method Details

    • setWallColour

      private java.io.FileInputStream setWallColour()
      This method selects the picture to be filled in WALL object. It determines which picture to choose by obtaining the index from SubModel.GetWallColour().
      Returns:
      FileInputStream inputStream.

    • setKeeper

      private java.io.FileInputStream setKeeper()
      This method selects the picture to be filled in KEEPER object. It determines which picture to choose by obtaining the index from StartMeUp.GetKeeper().
      Returns:
      FileInputStream inputStream.
